item.description:
Figures our first Sunday Trail Run from Pier One has a snow covered trail. Since the roads in that area are pretty busy with traffic I decided to move the starting location to Commuter Lot near Dixwell Ave. & Hartford Tpke. in North Haven. Seems to be the closest parking lot near a decent running road. The address to use if you need to find it with GPS is 8 Devine Street - 06473.

I mapped out a route that is 8 miles but there are convenient turn around points for running 4 or 6 miles. We can decide on the distance based on the weather conditions in the morning. Below is a link to the proposed running route.

http://www.mapmyrun.c...
item.name: Commuter Lot - SUNDAY RUN
